resources.string:
When you press the start match button you will be presented with the screen you will use while in teleop. Do not record scores in Autonomous mode.

	For every gear that the robot receives, either from the gear slot or off the ground, press the green button in the "Pickup" row. For every gear failed to be collected, press the red button in the "Pickup" row.

	For every gear scored, press the green button in the "Scored" row. For every gear that is dropped off of the peg, press the red button in the "Scored" row.

	If a gear is dropped at another time, press the grey "Gear Dropped" button.

	When a robot shoots at a low or high goal increment each respectivly with the top button, green for scored, red for missed. The bottom buttons will decrement.

	When the match end whistle sounds, press the end match button, this is time sensitive. It will then copy data to your clipboard, you must paste this into the "Data from teleop app" text box under the "Midgame" tab in Memento.
